item.description:
http://www.facebook.com/event.php?eid=218573971514342  

3rd Annual NHYR Lobster Bake

UPDATE: join us for a pub crawl to promote HR 1139 "Keep Your Tips Act" following the straw poll. More info on pub crawl here: http://www.facebook.com/ev​ent.php?eid=17778426562258​3

Presidential Candidates who will attend straw poll:

Hermain Cain, Gov. Gary Johnson, US Rep. Thaddeus McCotter

... Additional Speaker: Fox News contributor S.E. Cupp

$35 for Young Republicans (up to age 40)
$50 for all others

Please join us for an afternoon of fun, food and politics by the beach at The Great Island Common New Castle, NH. Whether you're young or just young at heart, from NH or one of our neighboring states, we'd love to have your company for this great event.

(The Great Island Common is located at the corner of Wentworth Road and Tabbutt Memorial Way behind the New Castle Library at 301 Wentworth Road, tickets include free parking and this venue is on a sandy beach)

To pay by check, please register using the same form, and indicate "pay offline" when prompted.
http://nhyrlobster3.doatte​nd.com/

Ticket price includes the cost of food.

Only ticket holders will be able to vote in the straw poll.

(Event Sponsorship Opportunities Are Available)
Please Contact David Hurst @ info@nhyr.com or (603)540-3390
item.name: Vote for Ron in the "NHYR Lobster Bake & Straw Poll"
